trans-unit.source: A persistence provider throws this exception when it is unable to acquire a lock on an instance because the instance is already locked by another owner.
trans-unit.target: 无法获取对某个实例锁定，因为已由另一个所有者锁定实例时，永久性提供程序会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class by using the error message passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>通过使用作为参数传递的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: The information about the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 有关当前异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class by using the error message and the inner exception information passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>使用错误消息和内部异常信息作为参数传递的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a result of a previous exception typically includes a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引发的异常，因此前一个异常通常包含对前一个异常中的引用<xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的原因。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command and the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>类使用该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合） 和执行命令所针对的目标实例的 ID 作为参数传递。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令所针对的目标实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, and the inner exception information passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>类使用的命令，对其执行命令，在目标实例和作为参数传递的内部异常信息的 ID 的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令所针对的目标实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance, and serializable metadata information of the owner passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>类使用的命令，目标实例的 ID 的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合） 命令已执行针对所有者的 ID 当前具有对该实例，并作为参数传递的所有者的可序列化的元数据信息的锁。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令所针对的目标实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例具有的锁定的所有者的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Serializable metadata information about the instance owner (who has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关实例所有者 （具有对该实例的锁定） 的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the error message that explains the reason for the exception, and the exception that caused the current exception passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>类使用的命令，目标实例的 ID 的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合） 命令已执行针对作为参数传递解释该异常，且导致当前异常的异常的原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令所针对的目标实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance, serializable metadata information about the owner, and the exception that caused the current exception passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>类使用该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合） 的目标 ID 实例执行此命令针对、 所有者的 ID 当前具有的实例上，可序列化的元数据信息、 有关此所有者的锁定和作为参数传递导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令所针对的目标实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例具有的锁定的所有者的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Serializable metadata information about the instance owner (who has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关实例所有者 （具有对该实例的锁定） 的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance, serializable metadata information about the owner, the error message that explains the reason for the exception, and the exception that caused the current exception passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>类使用的命令 ID 的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合） 命令已执行针对的目标实例的当前具有对该实例，锁定的所有者的 ID 作为参数传递有关所有者、 解释此异常原因的错误消息和导致当前异常的异常的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的 XName （命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令所针对的目标实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the owner that currently has lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前具有对此实例的锁定的所有者的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The serializable metadata information about the instance owner (who has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关实例所有者 （具有对该实例的锁定） 的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>包含有关异常的信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 有关所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关源或目标的上下文信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID associated with the current instance owner (who currently has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 获取与当前实例所有者 （当前具有对该实例的锁定） 关联的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID associated with the current instance owner.
trans-unit.target: 与当前实例所有者关联的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Returns Guid.Empty if the current instance owner is not known.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前实例所有者未知，则返回 Guid.Empty。

trans-unit.source: Gets serializable metadata information about the current instance owner (who currently has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 获取有关当前实例所有者 （当前具有对该实例的锁定） 的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: When present, this consists of the subset of instance owner metadata which is serializable.
trans-unit.target: 当存在时，这包括实例所有者元数据，这是可序列化的子集。

trans-unit.source: The metadata may contain information such as the location of the instance owner, who currently owns the lock.
trans-unit.target: 元数据可能包含实例所有者，当前拥有锁定的位置等信息。

trans-unit.source: The serializable metadata information about the current instance owner (who currently has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关当前实例所有者 （当前具有对该实例的锁定） 的可序列化的元数据信息。
